data: Print Transfusion Reaction Form from FormFast. Photocopy the completed form. Send original copy to TMS, and retain the photocopy on the patient chart
Refer to your local hospital policy for managing a transfusion reaction

Order Transfusion Reaction Notification for any of following within 4 hours of transfusion:
- localized urticaria  
- localized pruritus   
- IVIg headache that is responsive to clinical intervention
Order Transfusion Reaction Notification, no specimen collection required
For all reactions other than above, order Transfusion Reaction Investigation
Order Transfusion Reaction Investigation, which includes sample collection for DAT. Order additional tests below as per protocol
Verbal or telephone order is required to place urinalysis and blood culture orders below
Urinalysis Macroscopic (dipstick) with Microscopic if indicated
